sentence: Outside Arizona, challengers are also running against Representatives Marjorie Taylor Greene in Georgia, Madison Cawthorn in North Carolina and Lauren Boebert in Colorado.
title: Gosar, Far-Right Incumbent, Faces G.O.P. Challengers in Arizona
